title: Cant create a new account
body: Keeps saying need valid email however i just created the email so i can make the account for my nepheew

replies.body: The sign up error isn't always clear, but based on your info here I have an idea.  There is an age limit to creating a League account, so if your nephew is too young then signup might be declined.  Let me know if that clears things up!

omg riot i take back everything bad ive said you guys are on the ball today, Thankfully glad to say it has been resolved the issue was case sensitivity within the sign up. For some reason the email i was using got blocked due to having capital letters and has since been resolved through the live chat feature
Hell yeah, I'm glad it worked out.  Just for clarity, was it because the email was entirely in caps, or just a few?
its FairyofBMD and that was triggering it to be blocked or something but then i put fairyofbmd for it to work
